case.title: 26 Redhead search men from London and England - 26
case.text: hiya im a 26yr woman looking for a special male My name is Amelia, just come out of a long term relationship a year ago, not really done this before but not really looking for a relationship with commitment just want to focus on myself for now, I'm asian and interested in guys although I have thought about women, I'm pretty open minded and just looking for abit of excitement in my life, I manage a balanced lifestyle so don't have no time for anything else really but I do have alot of fantasies need to be fulfilled, I like to look after myself I go to gym regularly I'm a good looking woman, if you are interested call me, locals are ok but would prefer someone out of the area ;) Firstly some email ;) W8ing 4 u ! Amelia
